description:
Hoping to cheer Rumaty up, Kajika brings him a home-cooked meal. When she gets there, though, Quinza takes it and won’t let her in to see him, saying Rumaty still feels ill. Kajika, who thought they’d become friends, is hurt by the feeling that he’s avoiding her. When she returns to her room, however, Rumaty is there, and he suddenly tells a shocked Kajika that he’s going back to his country.
Source: crunchyroll
